DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate new EUS-guided biopsy needle ( ProCore® ) compare conventional EUS-TCB needle ( Quick-Core® ) diagnosis suspicious disorder . This study needle ( ProCore® ) new EUS-guided biopsy needle recently approve U.S. Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) use .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation New EUS-guided Needle ( ProCore ) Comparing EUS-TCB Needle ( Quick-Core )
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective To compare diagnostic accuracy new EUS histology needle ( 19G , ProCore , Cook Medical Inc. , Winston-Salem , NC ) conventional histology needle ( 19G , Quick-Core , Cook Medical Inc. , Winston-Salem , NC ) Secondary Objective To compare - The number needle pass require acquire adequate specimen - Length core tissue obtain - Diagnostic contribution immunohistochemical stain - Rates complication
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Solid tumor ≥ 2 cm size . Exclusion criterion : Thrombocytopenia
